lang.help_description: Changes the bot language for this guild, you must have administrator permissions to run this command.
lang.error_not_found: I didn't find that language, try one of the following:

enableTopicCounter.help_description:
Enables the counter in the current channel or the spcified channel, if you add "all" as an argument, the counter will be enabled on all channels.

Examples:
```{PREFIX}enableTopicCounter
{PREFIX}enableTopicCounter #general
{PREFIX}enableTopicCounter #general #other-channel
{PREFIX}enableTopicCounter all```
enableTopicCounter.success: The counter has been enabled on {CHANNELS}

disableTopicCounter.help_description:
Disables the counter in the current channel or the spcified channel, if you add "all" as an argument, the counter will be disabled on all channels.

Examples:
```{PREFIX}disableTopicCounter
{PREFIX}disableTopicCounter #general
{PREFIX}disableTopicCounter #general #other-channel
{PREFIX}disableTopicCounter all```

setDigit.help_description:
Customizes numbers that will be displayed.

 Usage: ```{PREFIX}setDigit <plain number> <custom number>```
 Tip: You can use an emoji as a custom number.

setTopic.help_description:
You can customize the topic with this command, remember to use `{COUNT}` or the count will never be displayed. You can also set a unique topic for different channels

If the first argument are channel mentions , the topic given will be only used in the mentioned channels.

 Example: ```{PREFIX}setTopic Current members: {COUNT} <- all enabled channels will use this by default
{PREFIX}setTopic #general Current members: {COUNT}
{PREFIX}setTopic #general #other-channel Current members: {COUNT}```
setTopic.success_unique: Topic customized for the following channels: {CHANNELS}
setTopic.no_topic: No topic were provided, more info: `{PREFIX}help setTopic`.

removeTopic.help_description:
This command removes channel topics that has been customized, here is a list of examples:

Remove customized topic for channels without specific topic:```{PREFIX}removeTopic```
Remove specific topics that has been established by mentioning channels```{PREFIX}removeTopic #general #other-channel```
removeTopic.success_unique: Unique topic removed for the following channels: {CHANNELS}
removeTopic.error_missing_params: Error: Missing parameters, more info: `{PREFIX}help removeTopic`.

seeSettings.help_description: Shows all bot settings for this server.

resetSettings.help_description: Restores the custom settings of this server to the default ones

update.help_description: If you think the counter is stuck use this command to force its update
update.success: Updating the counter for enabled channels, this may take a while.
